fields.name: TOM FORD - Leather-Trimmed Cotton-Velvet Padded Quilted Down Jacket - Black
fields.description: TOM FORD knows how to make outerwear refined and sophisticated. This down jacket is made from plush cotton-velvet and trimmed with tonal leather for a subtle textural contrast. The hood is handily detachable so you can streamline your look when it's dry out" 100% Cotton

fields.name: Gucci GG Rhombus Vacation Shirt
fields.description: Inspired by horse racing, Gucci’s latest collection is a colourful line-up of clobber that includes this vacation shirt which pays tribute to the uniforms worn by jockeys. Expertly crafted in Italy from pure silk, its lightweight and breathable ground serves as a canvas for the multi-coloured geometric print. Detailed with the label’s iconic interlocking G’s throughout, this relaxed style is definitely one to place your bet on." inseam polyester/rayon/spandex washable imported
